snippet.title: Hot Shot Burn Teaser | Play the Open Beta
snippet.description:
Explode your friends and loved ones in Hot Shot Burn, the hilariously violent party brawler for up to 4 players. Coming to Steam Early Access on August 15, 2019 and consoles in 2020.

Play for free in the Open Beta: https://discord.gg/HotShotBurn
Wishlist on Steam: https://smarturl.it/hsb-steam

Hot Shot Burn is the hilariously violent arena party brawler that lets you compete in the universe's ultimate televised blood sport. It's fast-paced, competitive and supports both local and online multiplayer.

Follow us: 
Web: http://hsb.tv
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hotshotburn
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/hotshotburngame
